data.text: @TheOnlyMayhem ¡Hi! Do you have a claim number? Please share this information with us through DM. *GV
@jaimebee6 What is the email that you contacted to? Additional the travel agency must to follow up the entire process and update the information to the passengers. *HS
@jaimebee6 Jaime, in this case since the ticket was purchased through a third party the travel agency needs to proceed the flexibility policy, in this case the refund. *HS

@Presidnt_Carter We share the following email: amcustomersupport@aeromexico.com
The response time is between 5 and 15 business days. * KR
@Presidnt_Carter Hello, please share with us the situation and your reservation code. We will verify the situation. *HS
@Pbaxi We apologize for the inconvenience, at the moment all of our agents are following up on all calls. Remember that our service is 24 hrs. * OO

@johndavidinter We inform you that through this channel it is not possible to make quotes, purchases or changes. So it is necessary to contact our call center, we ask you to be patient and not hang up to avoid losing your place; at the moment our sales agents are following up on all calls. * OO
